signals.text: BTC crossing $105k with institutional accumulation accelerating. ETF inflows hitting new records.
AI agent tokens (VIRTUAL ecosystem) seeing parabolic growth. AI agents that trade, create, interact autonomously.
Claude Opus 4 and GPT-5 launch showing AI capability leap. Coding agents replacing junior devs.
E-commerce AI tools (product descriptions, customer service, pricing) reducing operational costs 40-60%.
AI-powered trading strategies outperforming traditional quant funds. Retail access improving.
X/Twitter algorithm change: long-form content and expertise threads getting 3x more reach.
Bitcoin L2 TVL crossed $5B. Stacks, Lightning, and new rollup solutions gaining traction.
Decentralized AI compute networks (Render, Akash, io.net) seeing 10x demand growth. GPU shortage continues.

blindSpots.title: AI Agent Economy is the New App Store
blindSpots.text: Just like the App Store created millionaires overnight in 2008, AI agent platforms (AutoGPT, CrewAI, LangChain) are creating a new economy. People who build useful agents NOW will own the distribution. Historical parallel: Rovio (Angry Birds) was a struggling game studio until the App Store gave them distribution.

blindSpots.title: Bitcoin DeFi = Ethereum DeFi Summer 2.0
blindSpots.text: In 2020, Ethereum DeFi went from $1B to $100B TVL in months. Bitcoin DeFi is at $5B now with better fundamentals (bigger market cap, institutional backing, regulatory clarity). The same 100x is possible. You're positioned but not yet building on it.
blindSpots.pattern: DeFi explosion on new chain ‚Üí 100x opportunity

blindSpots.title: Your AI Assistant Expertise is Rare
blindSpots.text: You've been running a sophisticated AI assistant setup (Clawdbot, memory systems, tool integrations) for months. Most people can't do this. There's a growing market for 'AI operations consultants' who set up AI workflows for businesses. You could productize this knowledge.
